about_the_game:
Welcome to Our Home


Unveil the forbidden secrets of Our Home and let yourself be seduced by a fiery game of riddles and pleasures.





Our Home is a visual novel set in the charming town of Pinheiro, located on the border between neighboring countries to Brazil. This picturesque town is supported by tourism and two large transportation companies, which are the main sources of income and employment for the local residents. The presence of these transportation companies is due to Pinheiro's strategic position, which facilitates the logistics and transit of people and goods across the border.


Our Home tells the story of a young man who has lived his whole life in an orphanage. Knowing that his mother died in childbirth, and his father left even before he was born, when he reaches adulthood he leaves the orphanage so he can find the answers to all the questions surrounding his life.

Characters, or the ladies you'll "adore" and the fellas you'll leave in the dust


Every sassy dame in the game is a prize waiting to be won. However, it won't be a walk in the park or a snap of the fingers to make it happen. Each conquest will be a wild adventure, packed with twists and turns that'll cater to all your exotic tastes.

Now let's talk about the competition. They either join your noble cause as trusty sidekicks or become the pitiful foes whose plans you'll sabotage in the most amusing ways imaginable. Oh, the sweet taste of victory!

Fear not dear players, for this game is a sacred haven untainted by the devilish NTR (Netorare) curse.. It's a drama-free zone, ensuring your heart stays intact and your laughter remains abundant. Let the fun commence!

The Environments


Despite the ongoing construction, we've released a bunch of cool environments for you to roam around freely. It's like a choose-your-own-adventure book, but with less paper cuts and more virtual fun! Explore these unique landscapes and stumble upon exciting missions that can make you feel like a secret agent (minus the fancy gadgets, unfortunately).

We went all in on this project to make the world simply awesome! We spent a ton of time perfecting the details to give you an incredible experience. There are sound effects that will make your hair stand on end, animations that will leave you speechless, and background art that changes with the weather like a fashionable chameleon. Seriously, it's hat-worthy!

The Gameplay


Relax, my friend. Our Home's gameplay may seem like a puzzle at first, but we'll help you make sense of this mess in no time! Just follow the content of the characters you like and as you throw yourself into the adventures, the romance and sex scenes will roll loose! Just don't forget to bring popcorn and soda to the show! (Or maybe a paper towel and some lube)

The Choices


Hold on to your keyboard, folks. When it comes to Our Home, it's all about the juicy decisions! You can choose to reveal or conceal certain info, leading to intriguing conversations and scenes that are more steamy than a sauna with hot girls. Fear not, my gaming comrades, we'll make sure you're well aware when your choices can shake up the storyline like a wild earthquake.

The Secrets


But wait, there's more! For those who simply can't resist a little sneak peek into the forbidden, we've got an option to pay your way to see what goes down. It's like having a backstage pass to the wildest show in town, where the curtains are drawn back and your curiosity takes center stage.

So, what are you waiting for? GET THE GAME!

content_descriptors.notes:
"Our Home" is a fictional game intended for adults aged 18 and older. This game offers an adult entertainment experience and includes scenes of consensual sexual acts. The narrative contains explicit references to drugs, drug trafficking, extreme violence, and coercion. Additionally, it addresses sensitive themes such as drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, and suicide.

All these representations are fictional and are an integral part of the game's story. We recommend that only those over 18 play and remind players of the importance of consuming media responsibly.

Enjoy "Our Home."

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Our Home

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to Our Home Unveil the forbidden secrets and let yourself be seduced by a fiery game of riddles and pleasures.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hindi
